participant_1.background:
I am passionate about spending time with my family, no matter how old we are.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!
I am a disappointment to my family but I find solace in reading fiction.
I'm not sure if I'll ever know my ethnic background, but I'm happy with the family I've found.

participant_2.background:
I'm not very concerned about my appearance, as long as I look presentable.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

content.text: I don't really have a favorite color. What's yours?
I like the color red. It's a warm and vibrant color. What do you do for fun?
I like to work on my home. I'm remodeling my kitchen right now. What about you?
I like to crochet. I've been crocheting for a few years now. I'm making a blanket for my friend's baby shower.
That's cool! I'm not very crafty. I wish I could crochet.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll check some out. Do you have any pets?
Yes! I have a dog named Sophie. She's a golden retriever. What about you?
I have a cat named Mittens. She's a tabby.
I love cats! They're so cute.
I'm glad we met. It's always nice to talk to someone new.
